name: Dr. Archie
overview: The hero of the story comes floating on a raft and must find his way through the jungle where it is teeming with not-too-friendly creatures such as caimans and piranhas. However, that jungle has resources such as weapons, food and special equipment. All those items will appear on the screen and can be selected. You must find out for yourself what they are all for. Only released on The Games Collection 2. Won the 2nd prize in the MSX Computer Magazine/Eurosoft games programming contest.
